text: László Karácson was a modern pentathlete from Hungary. László competed at the 1948 Summer Olympics. He was born on November 24, 1918 and died on May 1, 2004.László Karácson == References == Category:1918 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Olympians for Hungary Category:Hungarian modern pentathletes Category:Sportspeople from Budapest
title: László Karácson
